attributes.action: EVEROLIMUS TO BE FREE FOR PEOPLE WITH TUBEROUS SCLEROSIS
attributes.background:
EVEROLIMUS should be prescribed for people with TUBEROUS Sclerosis!
It has been proven to be of benefit to those diagnosed with TS with Epilepsy and also has the benefit of shrinking tumours. That are a part  of this condition.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for deciding which drugs should be prescribed for specific conditions. Deciding about prescriptions in specific cases is the responsibility of doctors.
